'''Stephen Tyrone Colbert''' is an American political satirist, writer, actor, comedian, and television host of Comedy Central's ''The Colbert Report'' and CBS's ''The Late Show with Stephen Colbert''. He had a cameo in ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' as one of the [[Laketown Spies]].<ref>[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt1170358/fullcredits/?ref_=tt_cl_sm The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug] at [https://www.imdb.com IMDb] (accessed 22 March 2023)</ref>

Tolkien scholar [[John D. Rateliff]] has suggested that Colbert has offered a formerly unrecorded piece of scholarly insight into ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', by the latter's suggestion that "''[[Gandalf]] knew [[Frodo]] would fail in his quest to destroy the [[The One Ring|Ring]], because he'd seen with his own eyes that Frodo could not throw the ring into his own fire at [[Bag-End]]''".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[John D. Rateliff]]|articleurl=http://sacnoths.blogspot.se/2016/08/stephen-colbert-is-brilliant-frodo-ring.html|articlename=Stephen Colbert is Brilliant (Frodo & the Ring)|dated=27 AUgust 2016|website=Sac|accessed=29 August 2016}}</ref>
